headline.print_headline: Michael Brown's Legacy Continues to Evolve
headline.main: Michael Brown's Legacy Continues to Evolve

lead_paragraph: For some Americans on opposite sides of a national debate, Michael Brown has become a symbol, epitomizing their polarized views on who bears the blame for the toll of young black men killed by police officers. Brown was a gentle giant, in one version. A defiant troublemaker, in another.
